name: Contrapositive (Game Jam)
description:
Controls:

- Arrow keys / WASD to move

- Up / W / Z to Launch

How to play:

Launch your energy  bullet and steer it into solid-coloured enemies to stop them from destroying the space station in the center. You can only destroy enemies that are filled with a solid color, but they are also the only enemies that can do damage to the station so enemies with only an outline are harmless.

Watch out for the colors flipping when you destroy an enemy however, as this flips all of the enemies polarity's, turning harmless enemies into deadly ones and vice versa.
